title: Coin Flip Probability
problem: You flip a fair coin 3 times. What is the probability of getting exactly 2 heads?
expected_reasoning: Total possible outcomes when flipping 3 coins: 2³ = 8
List all possible outcomes: HHH, HHT, HTH, HTT, THH, THT, TTH, TTT
HHT (heads on flip 1&2, tails on flip 3)
HTH (heads on flip 1&3, tails on flip 2)
THH (tails on flip 1, heads on flip 2&3)
